Urine: Soreness in urethra; feeling as if urine could not be retained
Pressure in neck of bladder; urging to urinate
Urine contains mucous corpuscles and epithelium, albumen and casts
Abdomen: Feeling as if something rolling about
Extremities: Cramp in fingers, thumb, and wrist when writing - soreness extending along flexor carpi ulnaris

name: Brachyglottis
Relationship: Compare: Apis; Helonias; Merc. cor.; Plumbum.
details: FLUTTERING SENSATION. (Caladium.) Kidney and bladder symptoms predominate. Produces symptoms of albuminuria. Itching in ears and nostrils. BRIGHT'S DISEASE. Oppression of chest. Writer's cramp.
